actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make the credit for dependent care services necessary for gainful employment a refundable credit and to allow an additional investment tax credit for dependent care center property.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable income tax credit for expenses for household and dependent care services necessary for employment. Allows an additional investment tax credit for dependent care center property. Defines dependent care center property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make the credit for dependent care services necessary for gainful employment a refundable credit and to allow an additional investment tax credit for dependent care center property.
